import React, { Component } from 'react' import WorkSub from "./WorkSub"; import Button from './Button'; const formElementStyle={ background:"#0A0F14", color:"white", border:"none" } const buttonStyle ={ width:"200px", padding:"2px", borderRadius:"4px", fontSize:"12px", letterSpacing:"3px", background: "black", border:"1px solid #761903" } const textColor ={ color:"#f3f3f3" } const Contact = () => (

Contact

Feedbacks

Get in touch with us and we will serve you to your satisfactions, we would respond to your enquiries as quick as within an hour of you messaging us

Also let us know what you think about our products and service and how we can improve on them, your positive feedbacks and criticisms are highly regarded and will be put into consideration

); export default Contact;
